trans-unit.target: You already own the Aurora-1 Schematic.
Sorry Commander, your level is too low to attack this base.
Sorry, your invitation to this alliance has been revoked. You will need to receive a new invitation.
You are already running a Simulation.
You already have this permanent boost! Put it to work on your enemies!
Name or description is invalid.
You have already been invited to or requested to join this alliance.
Sorry, Commander. This base is already under attack
Commander, your equipment cap has been reached. Please delete some parts in the Engineering Lab to keep opening these boxes.
Your account has been suspended for #DAYS# day(s). Please contact support via the Help or Support link above for more information.
Your Engineering Lab inventory is full.
Alliance regulations require a 72-hour cooldown period before you can create another new Alliance. Please try again later.
Name or description is invalid.
You can't attack this outpost yet. Please wait 6 minutes and try again.
Error: Your level is not high enough for this Simulation!
You attacked another player but didn't end the battle. Please wait 6 minutes and try again.
Commander, you deployed more troops than you should. Please contact EW customer service.
Sorry Commander. You have already commenced an attack on a faction base. Faction warps will be available again in 5 minutes.
Commander, you caused much more damage than your troops could deal. Please contact EW customer service.
Alliance regulations require a 72-hour cooldown period before you can rejoin your previous Alliance. Please try again later.
Sorry, Commander. You need to be at least Level 10 to attack an online player.
This item is no longer on sale. Please reload the game to get the most recent prices
Your account has been suspended.
That player is already in an alliance. They must leave their current alliance before you can invite them.
Your messaging privileges have been suspended.
You have an active XP boost of a different magnitude. Once it expires you can apply this boost.
Unable to send. You are blocked by recipient.
